title: Math With Numbers From a String

data.title: Math With Numbers From a String
data.statement:
Given a string [[str]] containing either digits or letters (no spaces) and a random operation [[o]] of either {{<<+>>, <<->>, or <<*>>}} , return the number resulting from extracting each number from the string and performing the operation on every number.

For example:
Given the string <<abc1234def>> and operation *.

You would extract the digits 1, 2, 3, and 4,
then you would return the value of 1*2*3*4 which is 24, simple as that

If there are no digits, return {{"NULL"}}.
If there is only one digit, return that one digit no matter the operation
data.constraints:
[[str]] only contains letters or numbers
[[o]] will only be +, -, or *
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> string [[str]] of which you need to extract the digits from
<<Line 2:>> string [[o]] which represents the operation you need to perform with the extracted digits
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> the result of performing the operation on all the digits, {{"NULL"}} if there are no digits, or just the digit itself if there is only one digit. <<RESULT CAN BE NEGATIVE>>

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given a string str containing either digits or letters (no spaces) and a random operation o of either +, -, or * , return the number resulting from extracting each number from the string and performing the operation on every number.

For example:
Given the string abc1234def and operation *.

You would extract the digits 1, 2, 3, and 4,
then you would return the value of 1*2*3*4 which is 24, simple as that

If there are no digits, return "NULL".
If there is only one digit, return that one digit no matter the operation
Input
Line 1: string str of which you need to extract the digits from
Line 2: string o which represents the operation you need to perform with the extracted digits
Output
Line 1: the result of performing the operation on all the digits, "NULL" if there are no digits, or just the digit itself if there is only one digit. RESULT CAN BE NEGATIVE
Constraints
str only contains letters or numbers
o will only be +, -, or *
Example
Input
abc1234def
*
Output
24
